items.title: Canada needs more competition
items.author: Competition Bureau Canada
items.content:
<article>Canada needs more competition

Could Canada benefit from greater competition? Based on what evidence? What would need to change? Is that what Canadians want? We’ll hear from a senior policy advisor on how competition issues resonate with Canadians based on polling and market research.
Matthew Chiasson, Senior Policy Advisor, Competition Bureau Canada</article>

items.title: Elevating Canada’s Airline Competition
items.author: Competition Bureau Canada
items.content:
<article>In 2024, the Bureau launched a market study to examine competition in Canada’s domestic airline industry and to make recommendations on how it could be improved.  

The study – Cleared for take-off: Elevating airline competition—highlights the barriers that make it hard for new and smaller airlines to enter, grow and compete. It also examines how the lack of competition in the industry impacts Canadians, especially those in northern and remote communities where air transportation may be the only available option for essential services.

Read the report: https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcompetition-bureau.canada.ca%2Fen%2Fhow-we-foster-competition%2Feducation-and-outreach%2Fpublications%2Fcleared-take-elevating-airline-competition%3Futm_campaign%3Dcb-bc-social-media-25-26%26utm_medium%3Dsmo%26utm_source%3Dyt%26utm_content%3Dams-en-250619&data=05%7C02%7Cyves.chartrand%40cb-bc.gc.ca%7Cd2ce0a3bb5bd4c45baa608ddaf27d7b0%7Cb72ac62f06d54cd5824eee92319a4676%7C0%7C0%7C638859307842417914%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=R8ExA2DOS0vwp3JIzm6z5Hy5dbD5sXmZ9vo6xvgGEtA%3D&reserved=0

Available in French here: https://youtu.be/bzyABiPr8Jc</article>
